00031 class WaveState {
00032 private:
00033     
00034 public:
00035     WaveState(const int dim);
00036     virtual ~WaveState();
00037     
00038     WaveState(const RealVector &);
00039     
00040     double operator()(const int comp) const ;
00041     double & operator()(const int comp);
00042     WaveState & operator =(const WaveState &);
00043     int stateSpaceDim() const ;
00044     
00045     
00046 protected:
00047     RealVector * coords_;
00048     
00049 };

00052 
00053 inline int WaveState::stateSpaceDim() const {
00054     
00055     return coords_->size();
00056 }
00057 
00058 inline WaveState & WaveState::operator =(const WaveState & state){
00059     
00060     if (this==&state)
00061         return *this;
00062     
00063     delete coords_;
00064     
00065     int i;
00066     
00067     coords_ = new RealVector(state.stateSpaceDim());
00068     
00069     for (i=0;i < coords_->size();i++){
00070         coords_->component(i)=state.operator ()(i);
00071     }
00072     return *this;
00073 }
00074 
00075 
00076 
00077 
00078 inline double WaveState::operator() (const int comp) const {
00079     return coords_->component(comp);
00080 }
00081 
00082 inline double & WaveState::operator () (const int comp) {
00083     return coords_->component(comp);
00084 }
